languages.text: {n}Все кончается быстро и кроваво. Хрупкая плоть не способна долго сдерживать напор ярости людей, осознавших, что их чуть не послали на плаху.{/n}
{n}Everything ends quickly and bloodily. This delicate flesh cannot withstand the rage of those who have realised that they were almost sent to their execution.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Все кончается быстро и кроваво. Хрупкая плоть не способна долго сдерживать напор ярости людей, осознавших, что их чуть не послали на плаху.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Everything ends quickly and bloodily. The delicate flesh cannot hold back the rage of people who have realised that they were almost sent to the scaffold.{/n}
{n}Everything ends quickly and bloodily. The delicate flesh cannot hold back the rage of people who have realised that they were almost sent to the scaffold.{/n}
{n}Everything ends quickly and bloodily. This delicate flesh cannot withstand the rage of those who have realised that they were almost sent to the gallows.{/n}
{n}Everything ends quickly and bloodily. This delicate flesh cannot withstand the rage of those who have realised that they were almost sent to the gallows.{/n}
{n}Everything ends quickly and bloodily. This delicate flesh cannot withstand the rage of those who have realised that they were almost sent to their execution.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Alles endet rasch und blutig. Das zarte Fleisch kann dem Zorn jener nicht widerstehen, die erkannt haben, dass sie kurz vor ihrer Hinrichtung standen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everything ends quickly and bloodily. This delicate flesh cannot withstand the rage of those who have realised that they were almost sent to their execution.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alles endet rasch und blutig. Das zarte Fleisch kann dem Zorn jener nicht widerstehen, die erkannt haben, dass sie kurz vor ihrer Hinrichtung standen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Todo acaba de forma rápida y sangrienta. La delicada carne no puede soportar la ira de quienes han descubierto que casi les han empujado a la ejecución.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everything ends quickly and bloodily. This delicate flesh cannot withstand the rage of those who have realised that they were almost sent to their execution.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Todo acaba de forma rápida y sangrienta. La delicada carne no puede soportar la ira de quienes han descubierto que casi les han empujado a la ejecución.{/n}

languages.text: {n}すべてがあっという間に、血を伴って終結する。この繊細な肉体は、もう少しで処刑されるところだったと気づいた者達の怒りに耐えられない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everything ends quickly and bloodily. This delicate flesh cannot withstand the rage of those who have realised that they were almost sent to their execution.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}すべてがあっという間に、血を伴って終結する。この繊細な肉体は、もう少しで処刑されるところだったと気づいた者達の怒りに耐えられない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}一切迅速而血腥地结束了。那些人终于意识到，他们刚刚差点被煽动着上了绞架，我脆弱的肉体几乎无法承受他们的滔天怒火。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everything ends quickly and bloodily. This delicate flesh cannot withstand the rage of those who have realised that they were almost sent to their execution.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一切迅速而血腥地结束了。那些人终于意识到，他们刚刚差点被煽动着上了绞架，我脆弱的肉体几乎无法承受他们的滔天怒火。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tout s'achève rapidement, dans le sang. Cette chair fragile ne peut pas résister à la fureur de ceux qui ont réalisé à quel point ils ont frôlé l'exécution.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everything ends quickly and bloodily. This delicate flesh cannot withstand the rage of those who have realised that they were almost sent to their execution.{/n}
